response.overview: Former Special Forces officer Frank Martin will deliver anything to anyone for the right price, and his no-questions-asked policy puts him in high demand. But when he realizes his latest cargo is alive, it sets in motion a dangerous chain of events. The bound and gagged Lai is being smuggled to France by a shady American businessman, and Frank works to save her as his own illegal activities are uncovered by a French detective.
response.tagline: Rules are made to be broken.
response.title: The Transporter

release_dates.note: ブルーレイ ＜スペシャル・プライス＞
